alert.note: Alert for Cody Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 06 at 12:49PM MST until December 07 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Cody Foothills. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may cause damage to trees. Unsecured objects will be blown around. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Impacts will be greatest late Thursday morning into early Thursday afternoon when the strongest wind will occur.
info.instruction: People should be careful in forested areas and around trees. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
